tool_description: Creates and formats lesson content with text, multimedia integration points, and interactive elements for engaging learning experiences.

module_id.description: Target module identifier for the content

lesson_title.description: Title of the lesson being created

content_text.description: Main text content of the lesson

learning_objectives.description: List of specific learning objectives for this lesson

content_type.description: Type of content: lecture, tutorial, discussion, case_study, lab

estimated_minutes.description: Estimated time to complete lesson in minutes (5-300)

media_placeholders.description: List of media placeholder identifiers for later asset insertion

interactive_elements.description: List of interactive element types: quiz, simulation, discussion_prompt

error_messages: Invalid module_id: The specified module does not exist.
Content too short: content_text must be at least 50 characters.
Invalid time estimate: estimated_minutes must be between 5 and 300.
Invalid content_type: Use lecture, tutorial, discussion, case_study, or lab.
Too many objectives: Maximum 10 learning objectives allowed.
Circular prerequisite: Prerequisites cannot create circular dependencies.
usage: Provide module_id, lesson_title, content_text, learning_objectives, content_type, and estimated_minutes. Optionally add media_placeholders, interactive_elements, prerequisites, difficulty_level, and keywords.

lesson_id.description: Unique identifier for the created lesson

content_summary.description: Brief summary of the lesson content

word_count.description: Total word count of the lesson content

media_slots.description: Number of media placeholder slots created
